id: <here comes the id of the modpack>
versionid: <here comes the version id ob the modpack (<id>-<version>)>
name: <here comes the name of the modpack>
author: <here comes the name of the modpack creator>

mods: <here comes all mods includet in the modpack as a modversion json structure>
modloader: <here comes all modloaders of the modpack as a modloader json structure>

mcversion: <here comes the minecraft version of the modpack>
version: <here comes the version of the modpack>

curse.projectid: <the curse projectid, if your modpack is on curse>
curse.fileid: <the curse fileid, if your modpack is on curse>
curse.zip: <here come the link to the curse modpack zip file, if you have one>

technic.api: <here comes the technic api url if you have one (http://api.technicpack.net/modpack/MODPACK-NAME-HERE)>
technic.zip: <here comes the link to the technic modpack zip file if you have one(the file url, that you also set, when you create a technic launcher modpack)>

gmjsoni.giid: <global id initiatet by the gmjsoni. ignore this!>
gmjsoni.gmjsonu: <the gmjson username of the modpack dev. ignore this!>

meta.permissions: <link to a html permissions file (optional, only required for some services)>
